name: Lucidity (itch) (ProjectCloudy)
description:
Lucidity is an endless runner game, developed with haste due to a university project. You play as "Cloudy", our sleepy main character who flies on a cloud through her colourful dreamworld.

The game is nowhere near finished or polished. But we still hope you can enjoy what little we managed to create.

Lucity was developed in Construct 2 (yeah we know, we should have used Construct 3 instead) and will possibly be revisited in the near future in a different engine.
